page.title: 03Education in Sawbridgeworth
page.content: There are 3 schools in Sawbridgeworth in our Domesday area.The{Fawbert and {Barnard School}is attended by children aged 5 to 7.For many years it served Sawbridgeworth as an all age school.The Secondary School is called the{Leventhorpe School}and was built about 15 years ago. The{Reedings JMI School}was built 20 years ago and is still quite a modern building.It stands in a quiet part of the town away from the traffic.The classes have large windows which make the rooms very light.We don't have as many books as we would like,but we have a good library.The teachers all have different interests and many run clubs which we can join.Our games field goes right down to the River Stort and grass surrounds the rest of the school.All the children get on very well with each other.
